law.catch_line: Applicant filing fee â€“ Administrative regulations.
law.text: The board shall promulgate administrative regulations establishing a reasonable filing fee to be paid by each appraisal management company seeking registration under KRS 324A.152. The filing fee shall include the annual fee for inclusion in the national registry maintained by the Appraisal Subcommittee of the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 3, effective June 8, 2011.
